column5: Ok ...some artists round the globe have been having a discussion about artwork for hospitals  So I'm going to try and do my part  I'm going to set the wheels in motion and see if I can donate the original of this to a Hospital for Sick Kids  I tried to incorporate as many things kids like---up to and including--inventing a couple critters  Callin em "TerryKats"  Hopin it will distract them from other issues---I hope  Anyway here it is  24 x 36 Titled Optimism
Another stellar masterpiece.   :clapping:  I tell ya what, any childrens hospital would be lucky to have a Bushart hanging in it.  The terrycats are cute.  The colors are what set it off.   Bravo
Great work !!! And for a great cause bud !!! Those terrycats do look a wee bit like Terry
Thanks PS and Merky  and Pike slayer--sorry bout the Bronco's
Thanks Terrence, I'm almost over it now.
Awesome job Bushart. An I think its a great Idea to. Kids would love to see that, I know I would have when I spent time at Toronto sick kids growing up.
Well I'm a CFL guy but I know you were doin the Tebow a while back  Just to show I'm a good sport--not afraid of ridicule-----been a life long Tiger Cats fan  been a rough stretch
For sure that would put some kids into a different time of their life. Very nice Bushart! I hope they accept this piece of art to display in some of the rooms.  Cheers, Ron...
Thanks Ron---now I just need to get them to answer the phone in that dep't in the hospital (Donations dept)
I would like to congratulate you on a job well done and bound to be appreciated by the children.

Thanks Staffman  Good news today---heard back from that Dept at CHEO (Childrens Hospital of Eastern Ontario)  The woman I talked to really liked it and she's running it around the dept's to ensure no probs and she'll get back in a couple weeks  Good start
